sentences.english: And the quality yet inexpensive consumer goods from China have been warmly received by the local people here.
sentences.chinese: 中國物美價廉的日用消費品，也深受當地人民的歡迎。

sentences.english: American prefer buying Japs car and third world consumer goods.
sentences.chinese: 日本人喜歡買美國車和第三世界的消費品。

sentences.english: Netbooks are a hot-selling consumer product.
sentences.chinese: 網簿是一類熱銷的消費品。

sentences.english: Consumable market prosperity is stable, supply of goods is enough.
sentences.chinese: 消費品市場繁榮穩定，貨源充足。
交換自制的禮物或者消費品。

sentences.english: I know that F. P. A. insurance does not cover losses on consumer goods.
sentences.chinese: 我知道“平安險”並不包括消費品的種種損失。

sentences.english: However, unlike other consumer housing, substitutability poor.
sentences.chinese: 不過，住房不同於別的消費品，可替代性差。

sentences.english: Almost all Western consumer-goods makers have felt Beijing’s heavy hand.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎所有的西方消費品製造商都感受到了北京的高壓。

sentences.english: IsConsumableAction(slot) - Return 1 if an action is consumable (i. e. has a count), nil otherwise.
sentences.chinese: 如果指定動作條上是消費品，返回1，否則返回空。

sentences.english: Your choice ofconsumer products says nothing about your individuality.
sentences.chinese: 你對消費品的選擇與你的個性無關。

sentences.english: Report every incident to the CPSC.
sentences.chinese: 向消費品安全委員會舉報每個事件。

sentences.english: The price of this kind of consumer goods on our domestic market is open.
sentences.chinese: 在我們國內市場上，這種消費品的價格是放開的。

sentences.english: Others forfeited other forms of consumption.
sentences.chinese: 另外一些人開始抵押別的形式的消費品。

sentences.english: They want to make our consumables more eco-friendly.
sentences.chinese: 他們希望我們的消費品對環境更友好。

sentences.english: I know that F.P.A insurance doesn't cover losses on consumer goods。
sentences.chinese: 我知道平安險不包括消費品的種種損失。

sentences.english: All these demonstrate China's huge potential of high-end consumption.
sentences.chinese: 這些都顯示出中國奢侈消費品的巨大增長潛力。
